Title: Rheumatic disease activity, glucocorticoid use and COVID-19. Response to: € Comment on € Characteristics associated with hospitalisation for COVID-19 in people with rheumatic disease: Data from the COVID-19 Global Rheumatology Alliance physician-reported registry' by Gianfrancesco et al.
